You are using FOP trunk, right? If so, then this is a regression due to some refactoring in LineLM a few months ago, and apparently we do not yet have test cases for empty inlines, otherwise this would have been caught then and there. It's on my todo-list, and already rectified in my local sandbox, so expect it to be committed soon.

Thanks for reporting!
